segments.text: Ant Shirley , it's being years since we last met . How were you doing in the passing years ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . Where are the other guys ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a bit disappointing that they are all out for a movie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Bad timing . I want to see them so much . How are they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad . I heard you are going to graduate this coming summer , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's why I'm here . I'm thinking about buying a second-hand apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you go to a real estate agent ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , that will be too expensive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . By the way , what kind of apartment are you looking for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My first job's salary will be a bit low . So the cheaper the better . Just one I can afford .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I'll try my best to find a satisfying one for you .
segments.speaker: S2
